name: LIMBO WORLDS JOINED TOGETHER(GMTK JAM)
description:
hello all my name is Ryan McDougall, this will be my first GMTK and 48 Hour game jam, I wanted to learn how to make assets for games better so in this game i didnt focus my code nearly as much as I did for the Graphics . 

If you have enjoyed the game or even an aspect of the game please comment below your thoughts of the game.

CONTROLS 

W, A, S, D to Walk around.

MOUSE to look around.
